Description: Age, if specific age not given then range provided (i.e. 50s = 50-59)
Reported date (i.e. public announcement date) DD-MM-YYYY
Week of Report (Sundays are 1st day of week)
If no travel history, type of locally acquired infection
Label: Community, Close Contact, Not Reported

Description: Additional information to contextualize cumulative number of tests (e.g., explain reason why cumulative number of tests decreased)

Label: 0 = as reported, 1 = assumed/redistributed health region, 2 = new ID, 3 = modification in other variable base on additional sources
